ad_text: Life Care Center of Jefferson City Sponsored Ready to love where you work? We are looking for RNs/LPNs and CNAs for our second shift. $3,500 sign-on bonus available! We offer competitive pay and great benefits in a team-oriented environment. Apply on our website, or call 865-475-6097 for more details.
